welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brugherio, a charming city full of history and culture. Known for its beautiful architecture and delicious cuisine, make sure to take some time to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a new login every 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Milano Malpensa Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
